name: @etclabscore/ethereum-json-rpc-specification
description: Package containing tools to produce generated artifacts for the ethereum OpenRPC document. Please see the git repository for more information

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run generate-clients -- --ts-name=@etclabscore/ethereum-json-rpc --rs-name=ethereum-json-rpc -o build/
scripts.publish: npm run publish:typescript && npm run publish:rust
scripts.publish:typescript: cd build/typescript && npm install && npm run build && npm publish --access=public
scripts.publish:rust: cd build/rust && cargo build && cargo package && cargo publish --token $CARGO_TOKEN
